Name: Crimsonfish
Description: Lives deep in the ocean but likes to lay its eggs in the warm summer water.
Location: East Pier on The Beach. Requires level 5 fishing.

Name: Angler
Description: Uses a bioluminescent dangler to attract prey.
Location: North of JojaMart on the wooden plank bridge. Requires level 3 fishing.

Name: Legend
Description: The king of all fish! They said he'd never be caught.
Location: The Mountain Lake near the log. Requires level 10 fishing.

Name: Glacierfish
Description: Builds a nest on the underside of glaciers.
Location: South end of Arrowhead Island in Cindersap Forest. Requires level 6 fishing.

Name: Mutant Carp
Description: The strange waters of the sewer turned this carp into a monstrosity.
